Reviews.Title: “Happy to stay at the Rosebud Inn!”
Reviews.Author: CarlDurkee
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay immensely. Accommodations could not have been better. The rates were good. The owners were very helpful. They helped us with ticket purchases. They helped us with directions to places we wanted to visit. They were friendly, and eager to make our visit a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Brent S
Reviews.Content: The Rosebud Inn was very clean and very affordable! We were able to relax and enjoy our stay. We noticed it was so quiet and that was definitely a plus. It was quaint and decorated really nice. We loved the location nestled in the hillside. The staff was so friendly and accommodating. The beds were comfortable. It was everything we had hoped for. We will never stay anywhere else in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “My Favorite Place In Branson!”
Reviews.Author: PastorChad
Reviews.Content: My family and I discovered the Rosebud a few years ago on the recommendation of some friends at the church where I serve as Pastor. We now refuse to stay anywhere else in Branson. I can talk about price, the rates are terrific. But what is best about there Rates is you might find some place a bit cheaper, but I promise you won't get more bang for your buck than at the Rosebud. This hotel is clean and spacious and very comfortable with. We have stayed there 6 times or more and have yet to stay in a room that wasn't very comfortable! The amenities are wonderful, and the breakfast is GREAT, can't beat biscuits and gravy! The location is GREAT. It is not on the strip so it is easy to get into and out of, but it is close to everything in Branson! But what makes the Rosebud such a great place is the people. The staff and management are 2nd to none! The last 2 years I have brought a group of our Senior Citizens from church to Branson for a conference and we have stayed at the Rosebud and the staff has just been GREAT to work with, the managers have been so very helpful in getting rooms reserved and when I come to check in, they have everything ready to go and they go above and beyond the call of duty to make us feel at home away from home! You would be wise to choose the Rosebud for your next trip to Branson...I can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “An honest review of Rosebud Inn”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a very special event in Branson and stayed at the Rosebud Inn for the first time. Rosebud had come highly recommended and I can see why....very, very welcoming with a comfortable atmosphere and family friendly to say the least. Besides the easy access from almost anywhere, the clean and comfortable rooms were the right size, beds were comfortable, and the housekeeping folks were friendly and professional. Continental breakfast, tea and coffee in the mornings was most enjoyable. We needed a bit of flexibility with our check out times and since it was possible, management was very willing to help. Now, about the management....some of the friendliest people I've met (and I've met many). Courteous, professional, and warm. They did go out of their way to help make our event as smooth as possible. I would absolutely stay there again. As a matter of fact, I'm looking forward to the next Branson trip in order to do just that!

Reviews.Title: “special event”
Reviews.Author: stites57
Reviews.Content: I found Roseebud on line and booked for our 50th anniversy. We were very pleased when we arrived with the location. Clean large room, very quite, freindly staff, will definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: lovetravelz
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Rosebud numerous times over the past few years. We LIKED the location, price, and cleanliness of the motel. Unfortunately we will not be going back b/c of our experiences this time around. Management must need a vacation of their own b/c they were not friendly and seemed annoyed by numerous things. If you pull heinous stunts like fill your ice chest from the ice machine, take a soft drink to the outdoor pool, or ask for more kleenex, you can expect nasty passive-aggressive comments from management or just outright chastising. Luckily there are many more lodging choices in Branson b/c this was our last at Rosebud.

Reviews.Title: “No complaints here!”
Reviews.Author: Mriann
Reviews.Content: This was the second time we've stayed at the Rosebud, and it was great. I agree with a lot of the other reviews, you really can't beat the price. It is small but very clean and quiet. I love the location. It's very convenient to the strip but it is kind of tucked away on a quiet hill. The staff is helpful and friendly. If you're looking for a nice quiet place to rest your head after a day of fun in Branson the Rosebud is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent. Clean, quiet & simple. Friendly folks.”
Reviews.Author: john42104
Reviews.Content: Friendly & helpful staff. Free Wi-Fi. Continental breakfast with plentiful seating for all. Rooms clean and simple. All rooms non-smoking and no pets. Under $70. Quiet and away from traffic congestion.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, not such a great breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: MOmomto6
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Rosebud Inn for 3 nights. The rooms were VERY clean! The hotel was very quiet and a nice place to stay. The biggest drawbacks were the breakfast was lacking, and the beds were very hard. I would stay here again, but don't expect a gourmet breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, inexpensive, and very friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: ministerswife
Reviews.Content: We enjoy going to Branson every year and since we have had the experience in staying at the Rosebud Inn, this has been our fourth visit there. The rooms are very clean, the price is very affordable, and the staff is very friendly. The location of the Rosebud Inn is absolutely perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay at inexpensive price.”
Reviews.Author: ripvanmerlin
Reviews.Content: We travel to Branson several times a year. The hotel staff is friendly, the rooms are always clean, the price is right and it is easily accessible. I recommend this hotel without any reservations.

Reviews.Title: “I'm coming back soon!”
Reviews.Author: FayettevilleChris
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay, The room was clean and the staff very nice. It is just of the strip so you don't have all the noise but can get anywhere quickly. It is a great place to stay without breaking the bank.

Reviews.Title: “clean”
Reviews.Author: celann
Reviews.Content: Nice location,very clean room, free breakfast, reasonable price. Kind and helpful receptionist. I would definitely go back to this hotel and recomend to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: JWC33N
Reviews.Content: We stay at Rosebud Inn almost everytime we are in Branson. The room was very clean, folks very helpful, online prices very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable. Great Place to Stay.”
Reviews.Author: K-Scraps
Reviews.Content: My husband I travel to Branson 4 or more times a year and Rosebud Inn is our first choice place to stay. It is clean, comfortable, quiet and has a friendly staff - all the things we look for in a place to stay. As a bonus Rosebud Inn is, on the blue route, VERY reasonable priced and they have a good continental breakfast, too. I recommend the Rosebud Inn to everyone I know!

Reviews.Title: “One of the nicest places to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: tricia5680
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff are friendly and courteous, the rooms are nice and clean. The breakfast area is perfect for gathering your group to sit around and visit after you get back from a show. The location is perfect -close to the shops and shows, but on one of the back routes so that you don't have to crawl through traffic on 76 Highway!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place TO Stay IN Branson”
Reviews.Author: texasjake1950
Reviews.Content: Rooms clean, neat and well taken care of. Staff excellent and very accomadating. Plenty of parking. Close to center of most shows and shopping, but far enough from main traffic congestion. Excellent morning breakfast. Highly recommend staying here if you go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “This is the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in our travels”
Reviews.Author: praiser9
Reviews.Content: The hotel is super clean, with a very good breakfast. The employees are friendly and helpful. It is well located, not on the busy strip,but in minutes of the attractions of Branson. The outlet malls are very close by. We do travel baseball with the grandkids and I have stayed in lots of hotels, and this is my favorite.

Reviews.Title: “A nice inexpensive place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: countryrebel
Reviews.Content: This is a nice place to stay with family and friends. It is inexpensive and can get to just about any where within 15-30 minutes. Places to eat are numerous. Service is very good. People are very courteous and answers your questions about the town.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and incredible staff”
Reviews.Author: tennvolsfan
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay. The rooms are very clean and the staff are friendly. The location of this hotel is perfect. It is quite but yet centrally located to the shopping malls, attraction shows, restaurants, etc. I would definately recommend this hotel to anyone. I felt right at home!

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful, comfortable and has a great continental breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaVacationer
Reviews.Content: We are repeat customers at the Rosebud Inn. They have the cleanest rooms and very comfortable beds. They have a delicious continental breakfast and tasty coffee. The location is quiet and peaceful, but not too far away from shopping, dining or attractions. They have a great staff who make you feel right at home.

Reviews.Title: “Rosebud Inn is as sweet as it sounds.”
Reviews.Author: oreosdunk
Reviews.Content: The Rosebud Inn which I have stayed at many times has NEVER disappointed. Whether it was the service, the food or the peace and quiet of the area. It is just off of the strip enough to feel a little country but within 2 minutes you are in the thick of fun and entertainment. The staff is very friendly and help with all your needs. I love the breakfast that comes with the room. It has an awesome view and is very clean. Thanks for the good times and lots of good memories. I have recommended this hotel to everyone that goes to Branson. GREAT VALUE

Reviews.Title: “Simply the best!”
Reviews.Author: BooLynn
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Rosebud Inn on several occasions. The staff is very helpful and the rooms are always clean and inviting! Whether you are off for a romantic getaway or with the family, Rodebud Inn is a perfect choice! Great location! Easy access to shopping and restaurants without the hassle of the strip! We will definitely go back again and again!

Reviews.Title: “It was a very clean and comfortable stay!”
Reviews.Author: redontheheadTulsa
Reviews.Content: From the very beginning the staff was very helpful getting me into a room quickly. The staff was also helpful when it came to getting directions and taking the backroads so i didnt have to fight traffic. the room and restroom were neat and clean, the bed was comfortable. the location of the hotel was key since it was a little off the beaten path but still a short drive to the shows and restaurants. the swimming pool is kept very clean. i think the thing i liked best was waking up and eating the complimentary breakfast, the sausage and biscuits are delicious.

Reviews.Title: “very peaceful”
Reviews.Author: mythreeboys2006
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and our 3 very young sons stayed here in June-july of 2008. We loved being there. We were at the Howard Johnson the previous night and found it was very dirty I called the rosebud inn and she was able to get us a room for that same night. It was very very clean compared to some of the hotels i looked at. They had breakfast the usual contenintal cereal, breads and they even had biscuits and gravy. My kids really enjoyed the outdoor pool. They also have at the end of the hallway a shelf with towels and extra pillow and blankets if you need them just grab them is what we were told. Very friendly staff the lady at the counter showed us around as soon as we got there. we really enjoyed our stay here and will definately return. You just cant find as clean a hotel for the price in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful and Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: FootballFanTulsa_OK
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Rosebud Inn in Branson, and really enjoyed our stay. It was a peaceful, quiet place as advertised. The staff and new managers were very helpful and friendly. Our room was very clean and the price extremely reasonable for a family! We will go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for price”
Reviews.Author: elle_travels
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent one night at the Rosebud Inn. It was convenient to everything: short drives to Silver Dollar City and Branson Landing and just around the corner from Tanger Outlet. Our room was clean and had an adequate number of towels. The property was very quiet considering the location near the main strip. We would definitely stay there again. For the price, we thought it was great.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at your own risk!”
Reviews.Author: lovestayinginbranson
Reviews.Content: I stayed in July 2008 with my family. Around 10:30 P.M. we turned down our sheets and on one of our beds was a nasty feces stain! POOP! I kid you not! I called the front desk and the lady moved us to another room. I decided I would cancel the next night. I thought I should mention the problem to the manager the next morning and to my surprise she was rude and defensive. She tried to justify the stain! She said her husband and herself looked at it and felt it was a coke stain! I'm sorry but who wants to stay at a hotel that thinks any kind of stain on a comfortor is acceptable! There are many hotels in Branson to choose from. I am embarrassed to say, but we had stayed here many times before and one of those times our comfortor had a urine stain. I'm sure you're thinking why would anyone go back?! I honestly thought, " what are the chances of this happening again?" My mistake! Don't let it be yours! There are several hotels with the same nightly rate just down the street. We stayed at one and it was clean and everyone was friendly! I would recommend the Lynina inn or the Classic motor inn both are extremely clean, outdoor pool and breakfast is provided.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful Inn”
Reviews.Author: shirmart
Reviews.Content: Went with a church group to Branson, stayed in a quiet and peaceful inn with nice managers. Was away from the hustle and bustle of downtown but within driving distance of everything we wanted to see. One evening returned to hotel to have an overflowing toilet, was late at night and maintenance did come to repair but couldn't fix problem; had no other rooms, so we turned off the toilet. Was a misadventure, but otherwise our stay was okay. Managers were very apologetic the next day - sometimes things just happen.

Reviews.Title: “what I hoped for”
Reviews.Author: bulls5
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and booked a room, then I told my wife that I had booked a room for $ 41.00 a day, she had a fit said it had to be a dump..I was so glad when we got to Branson and went in she took one look and said that I had done a good job picking a place to stay..The Rosebud was clean, nice rooms, good breakfast, friendly staff, only thing that may be a problem for some people may be a small pool.

Reviews.Title: “Rosebud Inn - good value - good location”
Reviews.Author: crynay
Reviews.Content: The location is great, just off the strip, which is good for traffic. Rooms are clean, no cracks or chips in bathroom. Good Value for the money, under $50.00. Our friends in another room had a bad TV and they immediately came in and changed it out even though it was 8:00 p.m and apologized for the inconvience. The free breakfast was okay but the fruit was always gone by the time we got there. Toaster was really slow.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay At Branson's Rosebud Inn”
Reviews.Author: greatlilnurse
Reviews.Content: We were in Branson August 29-30. Making reservations were a breeze and we got the room for a reasonable $44.00 a night with their online special . The staff were very friendly when we checked in. I was very suprised how clean the rooms were. Everything had been freshly painted, at least it appeared that way. We were in a smoking room that smelled as fresh as the nonsmoking room my parents stayed in. My only complaint about the whole stay was the beds were not very comfortable. The mattresses were extremely firm and springy. I would definately stay there again especially for that price.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JessicaLynCrawford
Reviews.Content: I checked in the Rosebud Inn in Branson, MO at 2PM April 14th, 2007 and stayed one night. I was skeptical of the pictures I had seen on the web-site and various trip sites however, as soon as I walked into the lobby I was very suprised, I thought the decor was very nice as well as the Breakfast room. Breakfast is served from 6:30AM to 10:30AM, they serve Biscuits & Gravy, various doughnuts, and of course the regular cold food. Check-In: 2PM Check-Out : 11PM I stayed in room #106. It was a single king room. It was a extra large room, 2 chairs, 1 table, at least 12 towels, a soap/lotion dispenser at the sink, the bathroom had AMAZING water pressure. My guest and I both commented on it. I figured it woudl have been "drip, drip" that was so not the case it was just as you are at home. In the shower it had soap/shampoo/condit. dispenser. The room was actually pretty...or at least I thought and I'm the type that thinks you need to spend $300.00 to get the best. I did not see any weird spots or hairs laying around. The pictures shows a white Rosebud Inn however, as soon as I arrived they had brand new tan sideing put on. It was really pretty. Over all I am 21 years old and it was a great hotel. I had only read two reviews on it but it should have 1,000 good ones. It is located on Roark Valley Road. As soon as you come in on Hwy. 76 just look for the "Blue Route" sign and take it a mile or so and there it is on your Left Side. It's a quite area and very low, low traffic noise. I never heard one car that night. Why stay on a busy, junkie hotel on 76 when you can stay in a peaceful great hotel on Roark. Takes only a few short minutes to get to strip. One night cost me $48.00 including tax. The tax is 11.2%. It was cheap, comfortable and it will be the only hotel I will stay at in Branson in the future.

Reviews.Title: “VERY CLEAN...VERY FRIENDLY”
Reviews.Author: msubrett32
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the RoseBud INN....the staff was very friendly and the rooms were very clean and comfortable...especially for the price. They are not like other hotels that gouge you with the price to sleep there as they know you are in Branson for shows and sightseeing and would rather spend your money doing that instead of paying an outrageous price to lay your head and take a shower. I would stay there again if ever back in Branson

HotelInfo.Name: Rosebud Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 1415 Roark Valley Road, Branson, MO 65616
